霞.definition: rose-tinted sky or clouds at sunrise or sunset

霞光.definition: multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset

霞山.definition: Xiashan District of Zhanjiang City 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 Shi4], Guangdong

霞山區.definition: Xiashan District of Zhanjiang City 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 Shi4], Guangdong

霞徑.definition: a misty path; the path of the Daoist immortals

霞浦.definition: Xiapu county in Ningde 寧德|宁德[Ning2 de2], Fujian

霞浦縣.definition: Xiapu county in Ningde 寧德|宁德[Ning2 de2], Fujian

霞飛.definition: Joseph Joffre (1852-1931), leading French general at the start of World War One
